resources:
Copy & Translate
No translation history Clear history Exit Help
Copy & Translate Help \"Copy & Translate\" quickly translates texts in any applications that support highlighting and copying to the clipboard. The tool runs in the background and watches the clipboard. As soon as the new text snippet appears there, \"Copy & Translate\" pops up a window with its translation. To test the tool, type any text in the field below, and click \"Copy to clipboard\" button: Quit Copy & Translate?string> Run at next device restart Yes No
Clear Translation History?
